title: Close Protection Training
headline: Train as a bodyguard who provides close executive protection to clients with this free online CPO training course.
description: ‘Close Protection’ describes the physical security provided to clients who are at risk of harassment or attack. This CPO training course provides the skills required by bodyguards who protect public figures like celebrities and politicians. We take you through the job’s basics and define the terms used by close protection teams before guiding you through security processes like threat assessments, vehicle drills and route selection.
courseDescription:
A close protection officer (CPO) or bodyguard must be a highly trained individual responsible for protecting VIPs from danger. This CPO training course identifies the characteristics of a good protection officer and explains how to cultivate the traits and skills required to be recruited to perform their role. We explain how to effectively define the security perimeter and choose a vehicle route. We then go through the steps taken to select the ideal foot protection team while conducting general operational planning. We also describe the responsibilities and tasks of each member of the protection team.

The course then discusses how to conduct a threat assessment to identify the types, sources and potency of threats. We demonstrate drills used to improve safety while embarking and disembarking from a vehicle and show you how to reduce the risk of attack on the ‘Principal’ (or client) while travelling. We explore the principle of ‘embus and debus’, used to enhance safety in transit, and then examine various orthodox and unorthodox drills. The course provides vital information and skills you can use while working alone and goes over vehicle formation strategies that include more personnel.

We establish the benefits of good route selection and go over the principles and phases of reconnaissance conducted before you identify the vulnerable points for the journey and factor in security considerations. The course then identifies various criminal offences and lays out the legal obligations of the close protection team. Finally, we explain how to earn a licence from the Security Industry Authority in the United Kingdom. This exciting course provides skills required to make the most of high-paying opportunities in the security industry and suits anyone interested in working as a CPO. Sign up to turn your sharp eye and crime-fighting instincts into a career that challenges you while you keep people safe.
